artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. 3/8-5/8" strips of white leather and silver metallic covered cord separated by thinner srands of metallic cord weft. .50" of black woven weft at top before leather begins. Stapls to 11 x 8.50" card with 99.1 1012.19. "H-3" printed on card. (black, white, silver)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Leather Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1956
title: Leather Cloth
